entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
MUCH COOLER WITH LOWS AROUND 30
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING WEST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 40
CHANCE OF SNOW 30 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 20
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS 15 TO 20
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
